CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice without call for competition
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BI301

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: ЕИБ - Подкрепа за проекта за водоснабдяване и канализация на Фиджи
EIB - Podpora pro projekt v oblasti vody a odpadních vod na Fidži

BEI - Apoyo al proyecto relativo al agua y las aguas residuales en Fidji
EIP - Tugi Fidži vee- ja heitveeprojektile
EIP - Tuki Fidžin vettä ja jätevettä koskevaa hanketta varten
BEI - Appui au projet relatif à l’eau et à l’assainissement aux Fidji
BEI - Support to the Fiji Water and Wastewater Project
EIB - Tuki Fidžin vettä ja jätevettä koskevaa hanketta varten
EBB - Támogatás a Fiji Víz- és Szennyvízügyi Projekthez
BEI - Sostegno al progetto riguardante l’acqua e lo smaltimento delle acque reflue alle Isole Figi
EIB - Támogatás a Fiji Víz- és Szennyvízügyi Projekthez

BEI - Apoio ao projeto no domínio da água e das águas residuais nas Fiji
BEI - Susținere pentru proiectul privind apa și apele uzate din Fiji

EIB - Stöd till projektet för vatten och avloppsvatten i Fiji

TI_DOC.P: EIB - Support to the Fiji Water and Wastewater Project (LU-Luxembourg)

TXT_MARK.P: This operation will fund technical assistance services for a project aimed at supporting the Water Authority of Fiji (WAF) with the objective to provide its customers with quality, cost effective and efficient water supply and wastewater services by protecting the environment, with particular focus of this Project on the Greater Suva Area (GSA). The operation will consist of technical and environmental studies as well as capacity building for WAF staff.

The core team should be composed of a Team Leader, an Integrated Water Resources Management (IWRM) expert, an Operation & training expert and a Monitoring and Evaluation expert. The core team may be supported by non-key experts (junior/senior) as required by the assignment.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Intended timing of publication of the procurement notice

TXT_MARK.P: ACP-EU Partnership Agreement signed in Cotonou on 23.6.2000 as amended in Luxembourg on 25.6.2005 and in Ouagadougou on 22.6.2010; Council Regulation (EU) 2015/322 of 2.3.2015 on the implementation of the 11th European Development Fund; and Council Regulation (EU) 2015/323 of 2.3.2015 on the financial regulation applicable to the 11th European Development Fund.

BLK_BTX_SEQ.P: There must be a minimum period of 30 calendar days between the publication of this contract forecast and the publication of the corresponding procurement notice.
No applications or requests for information should be sent at this stage.

TXT_MARK.P: This operation will fund technical assistance services for a project aimed at supporting the Water Authority of Fiji (WAF) with the objective to provide its customers with quality, cost effective and efficient water supply and wastewater services by protecting the environment, with particular focus of this Project on the Greater Suva Area (GSA). The operation will consist of technical and environmental studies as well as capacity building for WAF staff.

The core team should be composed of a Team Leader, an Integrated Water Resources Management (IWRM) expert, an Operation & training expert and a Monitoring and Evaluation expert. The core team may be supported by non-key experts (junior/senior) as required by the assignment.

MLI_OCCUR.TI_MARK: Intended timing of publication of the procurement notice

TXT_MARK.P: ACP-EU Partnership Agreement signed in Cotonou on 23.6.2000 as amended in Luxembourg on 25.6.2005 and in Ouagadougou on 22.6.2010; Council Regulation (EU) 2015/322 of 2.3.2015 on the implementation of the 11th European Development Fund; and Council Regulation (EU) 2015/323 of 2.3.2015 on the financial regulation applicable to the 11th European Development Fund.

BLK_BTX_SEQ.P: There must be a minimum period of 30 calendar days between the publication of this contract forecast and the publication of the corresponding procurement notice.
No applications or requests for information should be sent at this stage.
